meta.title: Republic Day 2026 | College Events
meta.description: Join the Republic Day celebrations with a grand parade and cultural program on January 26, 2026.

about.title: About The Celebration
about.tagline: Honoring the Spirit of the Nation
description: We invite all students, faculty, and staff to join us in celebrating the 77th Republic Day of India. This is a day to honor our constitution and the democratic values that form the foundation of our great nation.

The day will commence with the hoisting of the national flag by our esteemed Director, followed by a disciplined and impressive march past by the NCC and NSS units. The celebration will continue with a series of patriotic songs, dances, and skits performed by students.

highlights.title: Last Year's Parade
highlights.caption: A look back at the proud moments from the 2025 parade.

categories.title: Flag Hoisting
categories.description: The main ceremony to honor the tricolor.

categories.title: March Past
categories.description: A disciplined parade by our student corps.

articles.title: 77th Republic Day Celebrations
articles.excerpt: All are cordially invited to attend the Republic Day parade and celebrations.

questions.question: What is the dress code for the event?
questions.answer: Students are requested to attend in their college uniforms or formal white attire to honor the occasion.
